channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion Deals
channel.desc: Elevate your style with Ruth Langsford's chic fashion collection. From classic jeans to vibrant prints, find the perfect pieces to boost your fashion confidence.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.
